modName: Tifa Lockhart - ECE Preset for Nord Female
summary: A custom-made character preset based on Tifa Lockhart from FFVII for Enhanced Character Edit.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center] 
[img]http://i.imgur.com/fYfqTsN.png[/img]

[font=Georgia][size=5][b]Tifa Lockhart[/b][/size][/font] [size=4]from [/size][font=Times New Roman][color=#9fc5e8][b]FINAL FANTASY VII
[/b][/color][/font][size=3]Enhanced Character Edit Preset
Version 1.0, by [b]Minoos
[/b][/size]
[size=1](probably not gonna update or anything, it looks good to have a version numba!)[/size]

[size=1](and this is my first upload. and I know I've never seen a preset description this pretty and dope on Nexus. who cares YOU CAN'T STOP ME)[/size]


[size=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/MBOS0ZXm.png[/img]  [/size][size=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/IqFAnSNm.png[/img]  [/size][size=1][img]http://i.imgur.com/zaFI32am.png[/img][/size]

[size=3]she looks even better in game y'know[/size][/center][color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b]

CAN I INTEREST YOU IN MY PERSONAL NOTES?[/b][/size][/color]

Basically this preset was made when I watched this year's E3, in a triumph of knowing that FFVII remake is on the way. I flipped my shit, son. For whatever reason, I wanted to do a Skyrim playthrough as an [size=3][b][color=#cc4125]unarmed fist-fighting female badass like Tifa. [/color][/b]

[/size]So I searched and digged into Nexus to find a preset for our good ol' Tifa, and I couldn't find a single goddamn one that even slightly resembles her (no offense lol). S'all good because I was like fuck it, I'm gonna make it myself. Me, being a lazy person who doesn't want to spend another fecking decade of life span to create yet another delicate character, I spent two decades making this one. heh. 

You know that vertex edit part in ECE where you can pick a point on your character's face map and edit it using X, Y, and Z coordinates? I fucking hate that bullshit. It's like doing shit tons of homework; you know it pisses you off but you gotta do it then in the end, you feel good.

I can honestly tell you with certainty that [size=3][b][u]THIS IS THE CLOSEST RESEMBLANCE OF TIFA THAT HUMAN KIND COULD EVER MAKE IN SKYRIM, period.[/u][/b] [/size][size=2][s]and im gonna track you down and murder you if you tell me this still doesnt look like her[/s] [s]come foit me 1v1 irl[/s] But I'm sure SOMEONE could make it better.[/size]

So yeah, download this if you're a fan of Tifa or FFVII or... if you're looking for a hot waifu character, go ahead *wink wink*



[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]HOLD UP, BROTHER. THERE ARE SOME THINGS YOU SHOULD GIT FIRST![/size][/color][/b]
[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]
[/size][/color][/b]Most of y'all have this I think, but to be sure. These are mandatory installs, or you will get some monstrous face of an abomination.  

[list]
[*][b][url=http://skse.silverlock.org/][size=3]SKSE[/size][/url][/b] [s][size=2]you don't say[/size][/s]
[*][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D12951%26preview%3D&pUp=1]Enhanced Character Edit[/url][/size][/b]
[*][size=3][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended[/url][/b] [/size][size=2](btw the author's a frequent updater.)[/size]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?][size=3]Fair Skin Complexion[/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50307/?][size=3]True Brows[/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?][size=3]The Eyes of Beauty[/size][/url][/b]
[*][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?][size=3]HDT Physics Extension[/size][/url][/b]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70363/?][b][size=3]KS Hairdos - HDT Physics[/size][/b][/url][b] [/b][size=2](be sure to install optional HDT fix if you have HDT enabled boobies and bootays, otherwise they will go nuts and bananas.)[/size]
[/list]


[b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]YOU WANT THE OUTFIT, AYE?
[/size][/color][/b]
Do ya want the outfit in the screenshot? Well, it's not actually an outfit, [size=3]it's a combination of clothing parts from different mods.[/size] There are a couple of Tifa's apparels on Nexus like [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12673/?]this[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14216/?]that[/url], but none of which interested me y'know. [s]and they dont have that jiggly effect and bodyslide feature ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

[/s][size=2]Yeah, so let's see here... [/size]

[list]
[*][b][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53864/?][b][size=3]Sexy Vests[/size][/b] [/url][size=2](sadly it doesn't reveal belly like Tifa's original tank top, and it comes in transparent - if you want to make it non-transparent, the author's instruction is in the link's comment section.)[/size]
[*][b][size=3]Mini Sage Outfit[/size][/b][size=3] - Only Skirt [/size][b][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50521/?]7B [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13363/?]UNP[/url] CBBE[/size] [/b][size=2](CBBE conversion is in some kinky ass place that Nexus tend not to speak of [s]loverslab[/s]. I gave you enough hint, you're on your own here.)[/size]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55611/?][b][size=3]Gim Boots[/size] [/b][/url][size=3][/size][size=2](comes in three color variations. red or black fits her well.)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63920/?][b]Test HDT Earrings [/b][/url][/size]
[*][size=3][b]Well I don't know for the glove/gauntlet part. You can just get a suitable pair of gloves and put them on.[/b][/size]
[/list][b][color=#b6d7a8][size=4]

B-BUT HOW DO I INSTALL?
[/size][/color][/b]
Put that shit into [i]CME_save[/i] file located in your [i]Documents > My Games > Skyrim[/i]. If you don't have one, then create one with the same name. 

When in game, simply open the console and type [i]showracemenu[/i] to access to ECE. Set your character to female Nord, then in [i]Body[/i] tab, select [i]Slot Load[/i], move the slider and you should see a prompt, choose [i]Next[/i], then choose [i]1[/i](doesn't have to be slot 1 specifically).

Voila! Your character is now Tifa! Go kick some asses with your fists!

BRO-TIP: Beat the shit out of that homeless dude in the Ratway and acquire his gloves that give you bonus damage for unarmed attacks.



[size=4][b][color=#b6d7a8]HEY MAN, YOU GONNA MAKE HER A FOLLOWER LATER? [/color][color=#980000][s]YOU BET YOUR ASS I'M GONNA[/s][/color]
[/b][/size]
[s]The last time I tried to make her a follower NPC, I nearly got my ass kicked by the difficulty of making one via Creation Kit. Welp, if you can make a follower based on this preset, it would be grateful. [size=3][b]MAKE SURE YOU FORTIFY HER UNARMED DAMAGE AND DON'T MAKE HER PICK UP WEAPONS!!!!!

[/b][/size]all-in-one version would be coolio.[/s]

Yes, it's finally here! Credits to JRCosta for follower-izing my preset![size=4]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73150/?]Tifa Lockhart Follower by JRCosta and myself[/url]

[/size]Also check his works, he's a really talented follower maker. Rather simple but beautiful.



[color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b]WHAT A FANCY DESCRIPTION FOR A SIMPLE PRESET, DUMMIE
[/b][/size][/color]
hey man sh-shut up
author: brandon3903 aka Minoos
